name: MSCRMToolInstaller
description: Configures the tools/dependencies required by all of the tasks
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: This task must be added at least once before other tasks in each agent phase for all other tasks to work.

groups.name: tools
groups.displayName: Tool Versions (Use to override versions of specific tools)

inputs.name: nugetUseProxy
inputs.label: Use Agent Proxy for Nuget Feed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to use agent proxy (if configured) to connect to the nuget feed

inputs.name: psUseProxy
inputs.label: Use Agent Proxy for PowerShell Gallery Feed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to use agent proxy (if configured) to connect to the PowerShell Gallery feed

inputs.name: coreToolsVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.CrmSdk.CoreTools - Version (Nuget)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [9.1.0.39](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.CrmSdk.CoreTools/9.1.0.39) Type latest to use the latest version available

inputs.name: crmConnectorVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.CrmConnector.PowerShell - Version (PS Gallery)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [3.3.0.886](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.CrmConnector.PowerShell/3.3.0.886) Type latest to use the latest version available

inputs.name: packageDeploymentVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.Powershell - Version (PS Gallery)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [3.3.0.879](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.PackageDeployment.Powershell/3.3.0.879) Type latest to use the latest version available

inputs.name: onlineAPIVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.Xrm.OnlineManagementAPI - Version (PS Gallery)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [1.2.0.1](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Microsoft.Xrm.OnlineManagementAPI/1.2.0.1) Type latest to use the latest version available

inputs.name: checkerVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.PowerApps.Checker.PowerShell - Version (PS Gallery)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [1.0.12](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Microsoft.PowerApps.Checker.PowerShell/1.0.12) Type latest to use the latest version available

inputs.name: configMigrationVersion
inputs.label: Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.ConfigurationMigration - Version (PS Gallery)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a version to override the default version: [1.0.0.26](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.ConfigurationMigration/1.0.0.26) Type latest to use the latest version available
